SEARCH
Package src.UserPackage

Class User

java.lang.Object
src.UserPackage.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
FollowerInterface, PosterInterface, UserInterface
public class User extends Object implements UserInterface, PosterInterface, FollowerInterface
The User class implements interfaces for the UserInterface composite component, a PosterInterface to serve as an Subject, and a FollowerInterface to serve as an Observer. All these Interfaces require their own list of methods that are identified below.
Version:
1.0
Author:
George Matta

    • post

      public void post(String message)
      Posts a message from this User. We add the given message to the User's news feed as UserID (you): message. We also update all the followers with the message
      Specified by:
      post in interface PosterInterface
      Parameters:
      message - The message String to post

    • update

      public void update(String posterID, String message)
      Recieves an update from a User that we follow. We simply add the message to the news feed as posterID: message.
      Specified by:
      update in interface FollowerInterface
      Parameters:
      posterID - The ID of the user who posted the message
      message - The message they typed

    • getNewsFeed

      public List<String> getNewsFeed()
      A simple getter method to retrieve the news feed
      Returns:
      The List of formatted messages (formatted with the poster's ID)
